Package org.apache.iceberg

Class SortOrder.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.iceberg.SortOrder.Builder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SortOrderBuilder<SortOrder.Builder>
    Enclosing class:
    SortOrder
    public static class SortOrder.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
implements SortOrderBuilder<SortOrder.Builder>
    A builder used to create valid sort orders.

    Call SortOrder.builderFor(Schema) to create a new builder.
